body:
* An option to sort comments regardless of downvotes

* Show how many views a post has

* Pinned comments

* Let us see the total number of guilds joined on our profiles

* Don't let new accounts downvote which will help against brigades

* As GM of a guild show how many posts were made in the past 24 hours

* Show a list of users that are following you

* Let followers of your profile see your posts regardless of private mode if you accept their request.

Let me know what you think, ive posted these ideas before to the official discord server but wanted to format it into a list so I know what ive already suggested.
body_html:
• An option to sort comments regardless of downvotes

  • Show how many views a post has

  • Pinned comments

  • Let us see the total number of guilds joined on our profiles

  • Don't let new accounts downvote which will help against brigades

  • As GM of a guild show how many posts were made in the past 24 hours

  • Show a list of users that are following you

  • Let followers of your profile see your posts regardless of private mode if you accept their request.

Let me know what you think, ive posted these ideas before to the official discord server but wanted to format it into a list so I know what ive already suggested.
title: List of a few ideas

body:
I'm against new accounts being unable to downvote. Sounds like a great way to wall off an echo chamber.

Most people who are interested in a quick brigade won't bother with registration

body:
How about disenfranchising habitual downvoters, i.e. users who **only** downvote and never, or very little, upvote?  
(Perhaps also overgenerous upvoting (especially upvoting only certain other users) could be disenfranchised as well?)  

Also downvoting below certain negative score is just a way SJWs punish other users, has little to nothing to do with the post/comment quality. This turned Reddit into cancer.  

Thanks.  

*(If there are some safequards of this kind already in place, then disregard this comment or delete it or let me know then I'll delete it.)*
body_html:
How about disenfranchising habitual downvoters, i.e. users who only downvote and never, or very little, upvote? (Perhaps also overgenerous upvoting (especially upvoting only certain other users) could be disenfranchised as well?)

Also downvoting below certain negative score is just a way SJWs punish other users, has little to nothing to do with the post/comment quality. This turned Reddit into cancer.

Thanks.

(If there are some safequards of this kind already in place, then disregard this comment or delete it or let me know then I'll delete it.)

guild.description:
This used to be a place to share, view, and track feedback for Ruqqus. Now it's pretty useless because the admins don't care. Try buttering them up on discord. They don't respond here. 

+ruqqusbugs
guild.description_html:
This used to be a place to share, view, and track feedback for Ruqqus. Now it's pretty useless because the admins don't care. Try buttering them up on discord. They don't respond here.

guild.name: BetaFeedback

parent.body: I wish I could hide posts to clean my home page.
parent.body_html: I wish I could hide posts to clean my home page.

post.body:
* An option to sort comments regardless of downvotes

* Show how many views a post has

* Pinned comments

* Let us see the total number of guilds joined on our profiles

* Don't let new accounts downvote which will help against brigades

* As GM of a guild show how many posts were made in the past 24 hours

* Show a list of users that are following you

* Let followers of your profile see your posts regardless of private mode if you accept their request.

Let me know what you think, ive posted these ideas before to the official discord server but wanted to format it into a list so I know what ive already suggested.
post.body_html:
• An option to sort comments regardless of downvotes

  • Show how many views a post has

  • Pinned comments

  • Let us see the total number of guilds joined on our profiles

  • Don't let new accounts downvote which will help against brigades

  • As GM of a guild show how many posts were made in the past 24 hours

  • Show a list of users that are following you

  • Let followers of your profile see your posts regardless of private mode if you accept their request.

Let me know what you think, ive posted these ideas before to the official discord server but wanted to format it into a list so I know what ive already suggested.
post.title: List of a few ideas

body:
I can't figure out how to post a thread, maybe it's because I'm a new member?

I have a suggestion as a newbie. On the front page (mobile), I was clicking the "art" section thinking it was (broken) button. I think it's a good idea to you move the "apply selection" to the top so it's obvious they're filters to scroll.

Also the main reason I joined is because this platform doesn't appear to have a US politics focus. I hope this remains that way with a focus more on general topics.

body:
Let followers of your profile see your posts regardless of private mode if you accept their request.
This. But there should be some kind of request to allow them to see your post history so it would prevent harrassing and trolling. Maybe some kind of friend mode where you could let your friends see your post history.
body_html: Let followers of your profile see your posts regardless of private mode if you accept their request. This. But there should be some kind of request to allow them to see your post history so it would prevent harrassing and trolling. Maybe some kind of friend mode where you could let your friends see your post history.
